== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

 0. ''Availability:''
** http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/scim-anthy, available for all supported architectures
 0. ''Rationale:''
** Japanese input method is required by Japanese people. It's a critical issue for them because they can't input their native language without it.
** See also MainInclusionReportscim
 0. ''Security:''
** No security histroy.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** scim-anthy is well maintained by Takuro Ashie who is employed in Good-Day (An open source company in Japan).
** Fedora, SUSE and Mandriva shipped with scim-anthy as their default Japanese intput method. No critical bugs are found in them yet.
** All complicated settings (set some environment variables and start the per-user daemon) will be done by im-switch.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets debian-policy and FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in universe.
** scim MainInclusionReportscim
** anthy MainInclusionReportAnthy
